content: type of instructions - written instructions - us crochet terminology used see picture example - number blocks - quicker way to crochet your blanket see picture example - paid version only also includes - a practice swatch to get used to reading the written instructions - how to page for the number blocks example included skill level - no crochet lessons included - you must know how to read a crochet pattern - you must know basic crochet stitches - chain single_crochet skip double_crochet etc - you must know how to skip stitches - you must know how to follow instructions - best for advanced beginners to intermediate crocheters finished size - 35 x 45 5 inches approx - this is a one size only blanket yarn & hook - stylecraft special aran - h/5mm crochet hook languages - english only with no charts terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final truly crochet - you will find this written crochet pattern for free on my website which is supported by ads this is the ad free version with number blocks included
